text: High technology (or high tech for short) is the best technology available at the moment. High technology can be defined as the most complex or the newest technology on the market.https://www.researchgate.net/publication/224679583_High_technology_revisited_definition_and_position The opposite of high technology is low technology (or low tech for short). This is simple and cheap technology. == Related pages == * Electronics * Innovation == References == == Other websites == Category:Technology
title: High tech
